description:
Mô Tả Công Việc
             

              Who You Are:
              
              We are looking for a proactive and ambitious talent to join us for the position of Talent Acquisition Specialist. You will be responsible for attracting top talented people to join Orient family, driving strategic initiatives and planning the implementation of recruiting campaigns.
              

              What you will be doing:
              

              - Actively creating a pool of candidates for sourcing through recruiting activities, social networking, community organizations, and media channels.
              
              - Handling recruitment process to hire the best suitable talent employees for the company. Including screen, shortlist, reference checks, offer preparation for potential candidates.
              
              - Conducting staff on-boarding, orientation for new hired.
              
              - Taking responsibilities for company employer branding at Job Fair events and other activities.
              
              - Building up and maintaining good relationship with universities to support for recruiting activities and branding.
              
              - Updating recruitment trend, channels, techniques to propose improvement for recruiting process.
              
              - Advise the development team on recruitment process for building up the application tracking system.
              
              - Be responsible for organizing CSR programs and activities of the company.
              
              - Coordinate with HR & Admin dept to organize company events and activities to build up the company culture, and connecting people.
              
              - Assisting HR in day-to-day department operation and general administrative job
              
              - Other related tasks assigned by the HR Manager.
             

              Xem toàn bộ Mô Tả Công Việc
